trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.
trans-unit.target: 헤더 및 단일 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 모든 컨트롤에 대 한 기본 구현을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: HeaderedContentControl inherits the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> and defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> property that is of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> 형식의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> 을 정의</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 및 속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> 을 상속 받습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> provides a heading for the control.

Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> can be any type.
The following illustration shows two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects, which inherit from HeaderedContentControl.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에 나와 두 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>HeaderedContentControl에서 상속 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> has <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects as the content in both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>: the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>; the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>가 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>둘 다의 내용으로 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>및에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> 및</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> is set to a string and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl with different types in the Header property A HeaderedContentControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") A HeaderedContentControl 헤더 속성에서 다른 형식으로 TabControl에 제한 된 기본 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: An application developer can create a HeaderedContentControl, but its appearance will be very simple.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 개발자는 HeaderedContentControl를 만들 수 있지만 모양이 매우 간단한가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 모양을 개선 하려는 경우에 새 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 를 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A HeaderedContentControl is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl 헤더와 함께 단일 콘텐츠 컨트롤에 대 한 모델을 제공 하기 때문에 사용자 지정 컨트롤을 만드는 데 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the header is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 헤더 인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the data used for the header of each control.
trans-unit.target: 각 컨트롤의 헤더에 사용 되는 데이터를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the Header can be any type.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> uses the same logic to display the Header that is described in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 설명 되어 있는 머리글을 표시 하는 동일한 논리를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A header object.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정 하는 방법을 지정 하는 복합 문자열을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>속성을 문자열로 표시 되 면.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: HeaderStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStringFormat는 미리 정의 된 복합, 또는 사용자 지정 문자열 형식일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 문자열 형식에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [형식 지정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, the HeaderStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, HeaderStringFormat 속성은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**| None |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정 하는 방법을 지정 하는 복합 문자열은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>속성을 문자열로 표시 되 면.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 헤더의 내용을 표시 하는 데 사용할 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 속성 요소 사용 # # XAML 값 *ResourceExtension* 다음 중 하나: `StaticResource`, 또는 `DynamicResource`합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
*TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey* 요청 되는 템플릿을 식별 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
> [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 속성 요소 구문을 기술적으로 가능 하지만 권장 하지는 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩을 사용 하 여 참조 하거나 가능 하지만 일반적이 지 않은 이기도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A data template.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.
trans-unit.target: 머리글을 표시 하는 데 사용 하는 템플릿을 선택 하기 위한 사용자 지정 논리를 제공 하는 데이터 템플릿 선택기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If both the HeaderTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the template selector property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우 모두는 HeaderTemplateSelector 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>속성 설정, 템플릿 선택기 속성은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from that implements a practical override.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 속성 요소 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 클래스에서 파생 구현 하는 실제 재정의.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 클래스를 매핑하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [XAML 네임 스페이스 및 WPF XAML에 대 한 매핑 Namespace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
*DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 요청 된 선택기 구현을 식별 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 실제 구현 하는 파생된 클래스가 키는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>재정의.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 클래스를 매핑하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [XAML 네임 스페이스 및 WPF XAML에 대 한 매핑 Namespace](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 프로그래밍 방식으로 추가할 수 있습니다 프로그램 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>클래스 리소스 사전에 리소스로.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A data template selector object.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets an enumerator to the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref>.
An enumerator.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref> changes.
Old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property.
New value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat*> property changes.
The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat*> property.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*> property changes.
Old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*> property.
New value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*> property.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector*> property changes.
Old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector*> property.
New value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector*> property.
Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref>.
A string representation of the object.
